name: ThinkFree Online Note Document
summary: Learn about .DOCZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DOCZ files can only be accessed through the ThinkFree Online Note application. You can create a DOCZ file by navigation to "My Office" and choosing New â†’ New Note(HTML). Notes can also be saved as Word .DOC files or as .HTML documents.

description: Online document created by ThinkFree Online, a Web-based application used for creating documents, presentations, and spreadsheets; stores a "note," which saves the layout, text, and graphics for a memo, letter, agenda, or other informational document.
